data.title: Cardano ($ADA) Founder Charles Hoskinson Signs MOU With Government of Brundi
data.text: Charles Hoskinson, Co-Founder and CEO of IOHK, the company responsible for building Cardano ($ADA), announced yesterday (October 26) that he had signed a memorandum of understanding (MOU) with the government of the Republic of Burundi.  An MOU is “an agreement between two or more parties outlined in a formal document.” Although “it is not legally binding”, it […]

data.title: Cardano Set To Enter The Babbage Era After Alonzo HFC Milestone
